summary.span: 表示 的约束集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of constraints for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过属性访问。The is accessed through the property. 可以包含的 和对象。 The can contain both and objects for the . 对象可确保特定列中的数据始终是唯一的, 以便保持数据的完整性。A object makes sure that data in a specific column is always unique to preserve the data integrity. 确定在更新或删除中的数据时相关表中将发生的情况。 The determines what will occur in related tables when data in the is either updated or deleted. 例如, 如果删除某一行, 则将确定相关行是否也被删除 (级联), 或其他一些操作过程。For example, if a row is deleted, the will determine whether the related rows are also deleted (a cascade), or some other course of action. > [!NOTE] > 当你将创建两个表之间的关系的添加到时 , 将自动创建和。When you add a that creates a relationship between two tables to a , both a and a are created automatically. 应用于父项中的主键列, 并且将约束添加到该表的中。 The is applied to the primary key column in the parent , and the constraint is added to that table's . 应用于主键列和外键列, 并将约束添加到子表的。 The is applied to the primary key column and the foreign key column, and the constraint is added to the child table's . 使用标准集合方法, 例如、 和。 The uses standard collection methods such as , , and . 此外, 该方法可用于查找集合中是否存在特定的约束。In addition, the method can be used to look for the existence of a particular constraint in the collection. 当的属性`true`设置为时, 将创建一个, 并将其属性设置为对象的。 A is created when a with its property set to `true` is added to a object's . 在将添加到对象的时创建。 A is created when a is added to a object's . ## Examples 第一个示例创建一个, 并将 (其属性设置为`true`) 添加到。The first example creates a , and adds a (with its property set to `true`) to the . 第二个示例创建一个、 两个对象、四个列和一个。The second example creates a , two objects, four columns, and a . 然后, 将打印约束的计数, 以显示在将添加到对象的时创建和。The count of constraints is then printed to show that a and a are created when a is added to the object's . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.name: constraints
param.span: 要添加到集合中的 对象的数组。

span.span: An array of objects to add to the collection.

summary.span: 将指定的 数组的元素复制到集合末尾。

span.span: Copies the elements of the specified array to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果调用了, 则`AddRange`在调用之前 , 不会将任何对象添加到集合中。If has been called, `AddRange` does not add any objects to the collection until is called. 调用时`EndInit` , 将使用最近对`AddRange`的调用中指定的项填充集合。At the time that `EndInit` is called, the collection will be populated with the items specified in the most recent call to `AddRange`. 如果`AddRange`在`BeginInit` 序列 / 内多次调用`AddRange` , 则只会添加在最新调用中指定的那些项。 `EndInit`If `AddRange` is called multiple times within a `BeginInit` / `EndInit` sequence, only those items specified in the most recent call to `AddRange` are added. ## Examples 下面的示例创建主键和外键约束, 并将其添加到中。The following example creates primary and foreign key constraints, and adds them to the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.AddRange Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.AddRange Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.AddRange Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.AddRange Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: if the can be removed from collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当向添加时 , 默认行为是向父表和子表添加一个。The default behavior whenever a is added to a , is to add a to the parent table and a to the child table. 应用于父表的主键列, 并且应用于子表的外键列。 The is applied to the primary key column of the parent table, and the is applied to the foreign key column of the child table. 由于在 删除之前尝试删除会导致引发异常, 因此在调用 remove 之前应始终使用方法, 以确保可删除。 Because trying to remove the before removing the causes an exception to be thrown, you should always use the method before calling Remove, to make sure that the can be removed. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来确定是否可以删除, 然后再尝试删除它。The following example uses the method to determine whether a can be removed, before trying to remove it. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.CanRemove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.CanRemove Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.CanRemove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.CanRemove Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Removes the specified from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`Remove`方法之前, 可以使用方法来确定集合是否包含目标 , 并使用方法来确定是否可以移除。Before using the `Remove` method, you can use the method to determine whether the collection contains the target , and the method to determine whether a can be removed. 如果成功删除该约束, 则会发生该事件。The event occurs if the constraint is successfully removed. ## Examples [!code-csharp[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.Remove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.Remove Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.Remove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.Remove Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`Remove`方法之前, 可以使用方法来确定集合是否包含目标 , 并使用方法来确定是否可以移除。Before using the `Remove` method, you can use the method to determine whether the collection contains the target , and the method to determine whether a can be removed. 如果成功删除该约束, 则会发生该事件。The event occurs if the constraint is successfully removed. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法从测试后的中移除, 以及是否可以使用方法将其移除。The following example removes a from a after testing for its presence with the method, and whether it can be removed with the method. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.Remove1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.Remove1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.Remove1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.Remove1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Removes the object at the specified index from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回特定的索引。 The method returns the index of a specific . 使用`RemoveAt`方法之前, 可以使用方法来确定集合是否包含目标 , 并使用方法来确定是否可以移除。Before using the `RemoveAt` method, you can use the method to determine whether the collection contains the target , and the method to determine whether a can be removed. 如果成功删除该约束, 则会发生该事件。The event occurs if the constraint is successfully removed. ## Examples 下面的示例将方法与方法一起使用, 以从中移除约束。The following example uses the method together with the method to remove a constraint from the .
